pageProduct.name: Thankyou Purifying Body Bar with Green Clay 100g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

PURIFYING - For when your skin needs a little extra TLC, this body bar has you covered! We've packed this plant-based guy full of the good stuff, like shea butter to moisturise and Australian green clay! Not only does it cleanse and purify your skin, it's also are vegan friendly, made with recirculated water, and no product wastage. The best part? This bar exists to help end global poverty. Talk about a life-changing shower! MADE WITH LOVE IN AUSTRALIA VEGAN FRIENDLY NOT TESTED ON ANIMALS MADE WITH NO PRODUCT WASTAGE MADE WITH RECYCLED CARDBOARD MADE WITH RECIRCULATED WATER

Warnings

But first, read this Patch test before use. Store below 25°C and in a clean dry place. Keep out of direct sunlight and pooled water. For external use only. Avoid contact with your eyes. If you experience irritation after use, please discontinue.

Common Uses

Soap Bar

Ingredients

Sodium Palmate, Sodium Palm Kernelate, Water, Glycerin, Olive Fruit Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Fragrance, Basil Oil, Eucalyptol, Kaolin (Australian Green Clay), Shea Butter (Organic), Vitamin E, Carbon Black (Natural), Sodium Chloride, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Sodium Gluconate.

Directions

The how-to Massage the body bar over your wet skin to create a lather. Rinse off and pat dry.
